title: Morning Brew CEO Alex Lieberman is building a media brand one newsletter at a time
description:
Recode's Peter Kafka chats with Morning Brew CEO Alex Lieberman about his ambitious path from business newsletters to full-fledged media company and why he's looking closely at models like Complex and Barstool.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
